title:
Why does\'nt NHC schools have middle school wrestling, NHHS is fielding half a team this year, Brunswick has it in MS.

How do we field teams without a feeder? You can hire enthusiastic coaches, without a feeder- AAU does\'nt count-reaches few students....you only have to look as far as Brunswick and Cumberland County Schools to see that it has a big impact on HS wrestling in that area...

did you know that over 50% of lineman in NFL had wrestling exp. including John Cooper at UNC?
